title: Hackers!!!!  programmed "players" AKA Bots
body: i have been playing intermediate  bots  mode recently and i have noticed "players" with account names  in my team that were acting suspicious,they were spamming randomly abilities walking back and forth and stuff like that at first i thought they were  just low level players playing for the first time...but no i came across the same thing next match again same patterns walking and playing style with different account names.I dont really care if they hack but its kinda annoying when your whole team is like that.Is this a riot  thing cause it couldnt find a match or is it a guy xp boosting bot accounts i have the names of the players if needed

replies.body: We definitely want to look into malicious or suspicious behaviors in-game!  Please be sure to use the reporting tool after the game to help us prioritize who we look at.  It would help us out to include any additional information and details in the text field too.  Thanks for helping us keep the community fair and safe!
